text: Cleft palate 90% Non-midline cleft lip 90% Omphalocele 90% Congenital diaphragmatic hernia 50% Encephalocele 50% Spina bifida 50% Microcephaly 7.5% Micromelia 7.5% Renal hypoplasia/aplasia 7.5% Tracheoesophageal fistula 7.5% Urogenital fistula 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as
